com.password4j

Class AlgorithmFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.password4j.AlgorithmFinder

  • public class AlgorithmFinder
extends Object
    This utility class finds algorithms with their configuration based on the environment.

    In this context, by environment is intended the set of parameters set in the JVM and in the psw4j.properties file.

    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    David Bertoldi

    • Method Detail

      • getSecureRandom

        public static SecureRandom getSecureRandom()
        Retrieve a singleton instance of a thread-safe SecureRandom object. If the environment allows it, a cryptographically strong random number generator (RNG) is returned.

        The usage of SecureRandom.getInstanceStrong() can be forced by setting global.random.strong to true in the psw4j.properties. Please be aware that this configuration may affect the system performance, while ensuring an high level of randomness.

        It is recommendable for Unix systems to set securerandom.source to file:/dev/urandom in your java.security file.

        Returns:
        a thread-safe SecureRandom instance
        Since:
        0.1.0
        See Also:
        SecureRandom.getInstanceStrong()

      • getPBKDF2Instance

        public static PBKDF2Function getPBKDF2Instance()
        Creates a singleton instance of PBKDF2Function with the configuration set in the psw4j.properties file.

        If no psw4j.properties is found in the classpath or no value is provided for a parameter, the default configuration is used.

        Parameter Property Default
        Algorithm hash.pbkdf2.algorithm PBKDF2WithHmacSHA512
        # iterations hash.pbkdf2.iterations 64000
        Key length hash.pbkdf2.length 512
        Returns:
        a PBKDF2Function
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • getCompressedPBKDF2Instance

        public static CompressedPBKDF2Function getCompressedPBKDF2Instance()
        Creates a singleton instance of CompressedPBKDF2Function with the configuration set in the psw4j.properties file.

        If no psw4j.properties is found in the classpath or no value is provided for a parameter, the default configuration is used.

        Parameter Property Default
        Algorithm hash.pbkdf2.algorithm PBKDF2WithHmacSHA512
        # iterations hash.pbkdf2.iterations 64000
        Key length hash.pbkdf2.length 512
        Returns:
        a CompressedPBKDF2Function
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • getBCryptInstance

        public static BCryptFunction getBCryptInstance()
        Creates a singleton instance of BCryptFunction with the configuration set in the psw4j.properties file.

        If no psw4j.properties is found in the classpath or no value is provided for a parameter, the default configuration is used.

        Parameter Property Default
        Logarithmic number of rounds hash.bcrypt.rounds 10
        Returns:
        a BCryptFunction
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • getSCryptInstance

        public static SCryptFunction getSCryptInstance()
        Creates a singleton instance of SCryptFunction with the configuration set in the psw4j.properties file.

        If no psw4j.properties is found in the classpath or no value is provided for a parameter, the default configuration is used.

        Parameter Property Default
        Work Factor (N) hash.scrypt.workfactor 32768
        Resources (r) hash.scrypt.resources 8
        Parallelization (p) hash.scrypt.parallelization 1
        Returns:
        a SCryptFunction
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • getAllPBKDF2Variants

        public static List<String> getAllPBKDF2Variants()
        Finds the list of supported PBKDF2 algorithms by the environment's Providers.
        Returns:
        the list of supported PBKDF2 algorithms
        Since:
        0.2.0
